claim_decisions.justification: Active policy covers collision damage. Estimated repair cost of $7,850 minus $1,000 deductible equals $6,850, which is within authority level.
Sudden burst pipe is covered under active policy. Total damage of $9,775 minus $500 deductible equals $9,275, which is within authority level.
Comprehensive coverage applies to storm damage. Repair estimate of $16,450 minus $500 deductible equals $15,950, which exceeds Level 2 authority.
Theft with forced entry is covered. Total claim of $12,350 minus $1,000 deductible equals $11,350, which is within authority level.
Policy expired on 02/01/2023 before claim was reported on 03/10/2023. Incident also reported beyond 30-day requirement.
